| Q               | A                                       |
|-----------------|-----------------------------------------|
| Branch?         | 0.10 or 0.11                            |
| Bug fix?        | no/yes                                  |
| New feature?    | no/yes                                  |
| Related tickets | fixes #X, partially #Y, mentioned in #Z |
| License         | MIT                                     |

<!--
 - Bug fixes must be submitted against the 0.10 branch
 - Features and deprecations must be submitted against the 0.11 branch
-->
